definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏铁路建设三大技术难题的核心是冻土问题。

sentences.english: At present, food safety has become the global problem.
sentences.chinese: 当前，食品安全已成为全球面对的难题。

sentences.english: We're trying to solve the difficult problem by ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们正设法自己解决这个难题。

sentences.english: How to improve the quality of products was a difficult problem to him.
sentences.chinese: 如何提高产品质量对他来说可是个难题。

sentences.english: Real-word spell checking is a long-existing problem in the natural language processing field.
sentences.chinese: 真词错误拼写校对是自然语言处理领域中的一个难题。

sentences.english: At present, these problems are expected to be solved by using whole-cell catalyst technology.
sentences.chinese: 目前，采用全细胞催化等技术工艺有望解决这些难题。

sentences.english: This is a daunting list of challenges.
sentences.chinese: 这是一堆使人畏惧的难题。

sentences.english: The bear has a problem. Do you see what it is?
sentences.chinese: 这只熊有一个难题。你看到它是什么了么？

sentences.english: My shop is newest promoted portable trades the clothes awning, completely has solved these difficult problems.
sentences.chinese: 我店最新推出的便携式换衣棚，完全解决了这些难题。

sentences.english: Adult literacy is a global problem.
Technology problem is a important one which worrys the human.
sentences.chinese: 现代技术问题是当前人类面临难题之一。

sentences.english: But it’s the political challenges that will be most hellacious.
sentences.chinese: 但是最为棘手的将是政治方面的难题。

sentences.english: We will tackle this difficult problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们将着手解决这个难题。

sentences.english: The perplexing problems of identifying the amount of SO42- in dyes are successfully solved.
sentences.chinese: 解决了分析染液中微量硫酸根离子的难题。

definition: to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
lit. (bamboo) splits when it meets the knife's edge (idiom)/fig. easily solved
